TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClaimsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity

summary.span: Represents a claims-based identity.

span.span: Represents a claims-based identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是基于声明的标识的具体实现; 一个标识，即描述的声明的集合。The class is a concrete implementation of a claims-based identity; that is, an identity described by a collection of claims. 声明是有关实体所做的描述的属性，向右、 颁发者或某些其他质量的该实体的声明。A claim is a statement about an entity made by an issuer that describes a property, right, or some other quality of that entity. 这样的实体称为使用者的声明。Such an entity is said to be the subject of the claim. 声明由类。A claim is represented by the class. 中包含的声明描述实体表示相应的标识，并且可以用于授权和身份验证决定。The claims contained in a describe the entity that the corresponding identity represents, and can be used to make authorization and authentication decisions. 基于声明的访问模型相比，具有许多优点更传统以独占方式依赖于角色的访问模型。A claims-based access model has many advantages over more traditional access models that rely exclusively on roles. 例如，声明可以提供有关它们表示，以更特定的方式可以评估的授权或身份验证的标识多更丰富的信息。For example, claims can provide much richer information about the identity they represent and can be evaluated for authorization or authentication in a far more specific manner. 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和基于声明的标识已完全集成到.NET Framework。Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework. 这意味着现在表示.NET Framework 中的标识的许多类派生自并描述其属性访问集合的声明。This means that many classes that represent an identity in the .NET Framework now derive from and describe their properties through a collection of claims. 这是不同于以前版本的.NET Framework 中，在其中，实现这些类直接接口。This is different from previous versions of the .NET Framework, in which, these classes implemented the interface directly. 可以通过访问的描述标识的声明集合属性。The collection of claims that describe the identity can be accessed through the property. 类提供了几种方法可查找和修改声明和完全支持语言集成查询 (LINQ)。The class provides several methods for finding and modifying claims and fully supports language integrated queries (LINQ). 在应用程序代码中，对象通常通过访问对象; 例如，返回的主体。In application code, objects are typically accessed through objects; for example, the principal returned by . > [!NOTE] > 类具有以及属性。The class has a property as well. 在大多数情况下，你应访问通过用户的声明集合而不是通过集合。In the majority of cases you should access the user’s claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 你将需要访问个人的声明仅在其中主体包含多个情况下并且需要进行评估或修改特定标识。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要添加或删除从声明集合，调用方必须具有完全信任。To add or remove claims from the collection, a caller must have full trust. 在基于声明的模型中，属性和方法实现通过计算包含由标识的声明。In the claims-based model, the property and the method are implemented by evaluating the claims contained by an identity. 基于声明的模型中的基实现提供的属性和方法。The base implementations in the claims-based model are provided by the property and the method. 和属性使您能够指定应该用于评估在执行这些操作时，包含由标识的声明的声明类型。The and properties enable you to specify a claim type that should be used to evaluate the claims contained by the identity when performing these operations. 通过支持委派方案和属性。Delegation scenarios are supported through the and properties.

否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||初始化从`claims`参数。Initialized from the `claims` parameter. 如果`identity`是可从，从声明`identity`添加到之前所指定的新实例`claims`参数。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance before those specified by the `claims` parameter.| ||**注意：** 访问的值时属性基于的值返回属性。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果`identity`是可从的值`identity.Label`属性; 否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`不可从，不是`null`，并且具有属性不是`null`; 名称声明添加到使用的值的新实例属性。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 访问的值时属性将返回基于和集合。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||`nameType` 参数的值。The value of the `nameType` parameter. 但是，如果值`nameType`参数是`null`或空字符串和`identity`是可从的值`identity.NameClaimType`属性; 否则为将使用，使用。However, if the value of the `nameType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||`roleClaimType` 参数的值。The value of the `roleClaimType` parameter. 但是，如果值`roleClaimType`参数是`null`或空字符串，并标识可从的值`identity.RoleClaimType`属性; 否则为将使用，使用。However, if the value of the `roleClaimType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and identity is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

summary.span: Gets or sets the identity of the calling party that was granted delegation rights.

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the calling party that was granted delegation rights.
The calling party that was granted delegation rights.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以访问当前的调用中，通过以递归方式检查导致委派链属性。An application can access the delegation chain that led to the current call, by recursively examining the property. 可以通过访问的令牌的名义委托调用属性。The token on whose behalf the call is being delegated can be accessed through the property.

exception.span: An attempt to set the property to the current instance occurs.

span.span: An attempt to set the property to the current instance occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查声明和使用者是否不同于此声明标识，方法调用与此声明作为参数使用正确的使用者创建新声明的标识。The claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject. 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`应用于哪些实体可以添加为标识的声明的控件的属性。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity. 进一步关闭管道，授权决策都是基于在上中存在的声明集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

member this.BootstrapContext : obj with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.

span.span: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.
The bootstrap context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础对象是实例类。The underlying object is an instance of the class. 设置`saveBootstrapContext`属性上的[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)或[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)要指定的令牌是否用于生成的配置文件中的元素应保留在属性。Set the `saveBootstrapContext` attribute on either the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) or the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in a configuration file to specify whether the token used to generate the should be preserved in the property. 如果属性不是`null`，应用程序可以通过属性和方法访问原始令牌和声明它会生成类。If the property is not `null`, applications can access the original token and the claims it produced through the properties and methods of the class.

permission.span: 设置操作需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Set operation requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能通过部分受信任的或透明的代码中设置。

span.span: This member cannot be set by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Claims As IEnumerable(Of Claim)

summary.span: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.

span.span: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.

value.span: 与关联的声明集合此声明标识。

span.span: The collection of claims associated with this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可能包含的条目，将`null`。The collection may contain entries that are `null`. 中包含的声明集合实质上描述的实体，由表示。The claims contained in the collection essentially describe the entity that is represented by the . 介绍属性和由实体所拥有的权限并可以通过应用程序能够判断身份验证和授权检查这些声明。The claims describe the properties and rights possessed by the entity and can be examined by applications to make decisions about authentication and authorization. > [!NOTE] > 类具有以及属性。The class has a property as well. 在大多数情况下，你应访问通过用户的声明集合而不是通过集合。In the majority of cases you should access the user’s claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 你将需要访问个人的声明仅在其中主体包含多个情况下并且需要进行评估或修改特定标识。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很可能无法删除该声明，因为它不由标识拥有。It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity. 例如，这会出现此情况的主体拥有的角色声明。For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal. 与不同方法，它返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否已移除的声明，时无法删除该声明引发异常Unlike the method, which returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the claim has been removed, throws an exception if the claim could not be removed 指定的声明匹配的对象引用 ()。The specified claim is matched by object reference (). 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`应用于哪些实体，声明可移除标识控件的属性。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity. 进一步关闭管道，授权决策都是基于在上中存在的声明集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

summary.span: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.

span.span: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.
The role claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色声明类型是声明类型 () 计算此标识时，使用方法。The role claim type is the claim type () that is used when evaluating this identity for the method. 调用方法来确定当前的主体是否属于指定角色。The method is called to determine whether the current principal is in a specified role. 基于声明的模型将扩展此检查用于提供主体的声明。The claims-based model extends this check to use claims presented by the principal. A对象可以包含一个或多个对象和每个标识对象可以包含多个对象。A object can contain one or more objects and each identity object can contain multiple objects. 属性指定应该用于计算此时为角色提供的值的声明的声明类型对象。The property specifies the claim type of the claim that should be used to provide the value for the role when evaluating this object. 该属性设置构造函数中。The property is set by the constructor. 常用的值是。A common value is .
